overview_of_class:
Stage Combat.
This course will provide the student an understanding of basic stage combat while exploring physical risk and maintaining safety measures, all while telling a story through body, voice and movement.? Each student will be required to purchase a sword for $70.00. The student will also be required to maintain this sword. If it is lost, a replacement sword will not be available. The student owns and will be able to have the sword once the semester is over.

overview_of_class:
Whole-Body Thinking: Partnered Swing Dancing as Source of Collaborative Decision-Making
In this approach to swing dancing, the goal is for two people to join hands and use the rhythms they hear in swinging, jazz-rhythm-based music as a means of connecting with each other in both motion and emotion. The partners make these connections physically through the hands; visually through the eyes; and vocally by scat-singing wordless rhythms that reflect the beat of the music they hear playing.
